doc: Additional information about the user / phone
name: metadata

fields.name: appVersion
fields.doc: The Automatic App version on the phone used for setup

fields.name: osVersion
fields.doc: The OS version of the phone used for setup

fields.name: phonePlatform
fields.doc: The platform of the phone used for setup

fields.name: isStaff
fields.doc: True if the user an Automatic staff user [scope:user:profile]

fields.name: authenticatedClients
fields.doc: List of clients that this user has authorized through OAuth [scope:user:profile]
